segments.text: I made a doctor's appointment for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm fine . I don't need to see a doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I guess you're healthy enough to clean your room before school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll go see the doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bundle up . It's wet and rainy out there . Here's some soup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Soup does the body good , sweetie . It's what you need when you're under the weather .
segments.speaker: S2
